title: Software Engineer
description: Worked on the design and implementation of a system based on micro-service architecture to facilitate the integration of any IoT device in a supply chain to collect traceability data with guaranteed data integrity with blockchain.

title: Frontend Developer
description: I worked as a front-end developer on the implementation of the e-commerce platform "WIPIP" that also manage the delivery of the products.

title: Software Engineer
description: Worked as back-end developer in PHP and JavaScript on a system that helps people find discount online and a web search application - from design to production.

title: Full Stack web developer
description: Worked as full stack developer on miscellaneous large scale mobile and web applications as back-end and front-end developer. And I was a team leader on a event management app
